EmailTemplate.name: Accelerate_Cloud_Migration.Accelerate_Cloud_Migration_Nurture_2_Which cloud?
EmailTemplate.subject: Which cloud will you choose?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
What is the most cost-effective choice for your applications: AWS or Azure? This should be a straightforward question but for too many IT teams it isn't. The wrong choice can cost your company millions in unnecessary cloud spend. We can help you make sure that doesn't happen.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/choosing-between-aws-and-azure/]]>
In a recent blog post <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/choosing-between-aws-and-azure/]]>, our Cloud CTO, Mor Cohen, discusses how Turbonomic can identify the right cloud for you and your company in a matter of days.
We hope you find it helpful! Regards, Team Turbonomic
